comments.author: Claus Köll
comments.body:
Added a new System Property "org.apache.jackrabbit.core.defaultTransactionTimeout" to define the default transaction timeout.

XASessionImpl updated in revision 749622

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Do you need this in 1.5.4? Normally we only put bug fixes in patch releases.

no i don't need it in 1.5.4.
we can put it in the next feature release.

greets
claus
